meanings.definition: In a manner that is done deliberately or intentionally.
meanings.sent1: She wilfully ignored the warning signs and continued on her dangerous path.
meanings.sent2: He wilfully chose to stay up late despite knowing he had an early meeting the next day.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel wilfully knocked over the bird feeder just to watch the chaos unfold.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered wilfully, ready to unleash their fury upon the unsuspecting town.
meanings.sent5: The toddler wilfully smeared paint all over the walls, creating a colorful masterpiece.

meanings.definition: With full knowledge and awareness of the consequences.
meanings.sent1: Knowing the risks, she wilfully ventured into the dark cave to rescue her lost cat.
meanings.sent2: Despite being tired, he wilfully stayed up to finish his homework before the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The curious puppy wilfully chewed on the electrical cord, fully aware of the shock it would bring.
meanings.sent4: The detective wilfully followed the suspect, determined to uncover the truth behind the crime.
meanings.sent5: The student wilfully skipped class, understanding the repercussions of his actions.

meanings.sent1: She wilfully ate the last cookie, knowing her brother had been saving it for himself.
meanings.sent2: He wilfully ignored the speed limit, eager to reach his destination faster.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat wilfully knocked the vase off the table, just to see it shatter.
meanings.sent4: The artist wilfully added a splash of red to the painting, enhancing its dramatic effect.
meanings.sent5: The chef wilfully added extra spices to the dish, giving it a burst of flavor.
